title: Roadblock
desc:
- Can not be a corner space.
- Drive-By Effect: Stop moving and end your turn here. You may pay 250$ to not have this happen, if you choose.
- Stop-In Effect: Does not activate if you land here because of the Drive-By Effect. Earn 250$, x the amount of people who paid to not have the Drive-By Effect happen since the last time the Stop-In Effect happened.
